languages.text: "До тех пор, пока приказ Лорд-инквизитора Калькасара остается в силе, я обязан сопровождать {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} династии фон Валанциус, оказывая всевозможное содействие и поддержку. Боюсь, я не смогу удовлетворить твое желание".

traits.locale_text: "До тех пор, пока приказ Лорд-Инквизитора Калькасара остается в силе, я обязан сопровождать {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} династии фон Валанциус, оказывая всевозможное содействие и поддержку. Боюсь, я не смогу удовлетворить твое желание".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "So long as Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's decree remains in force, I am obliged to escort the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius and provide all possible assistance and support. I am afraid I cannot comply with your request."
languages.original_text: "До тех пор, пока приказ Лорд-инквизитора Калькасара остается в силе, я обязан сопровождать {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} династии фон Валанциус, оказывая всевозможное содействие и поддержку. Боюсь, я не смогу удовлетворить твое желание".

traits.locale_text: "So long as Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's decree remains in force, I am obliged to escort the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius and provide all possible assistance and support. I am afraid I cannot comply with your request."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So long as Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's decree remains in force, I am obliged to escort the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius and provide all possible assistance and support. I am afraid I cannot comply with your request."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “只要大审判官卡尔卡扎的法令依然生效，我就有义务护送冯·瓦兰修斯家族的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，提供一切可能的援助和支持。恐怕我无法满足你的要求。”
languages.original_text: "So long as Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's decree remains in force, I am obliged to escort the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius and provide all possible assistance and support. I am afraid I cannot comply with your request."

traits.locale_text: “只要卡尔卡扎审判长的法令依然生效，我就有义务护送冯·瓦兰修斯家族的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，提供一切可能的援助和支持。恐怕我无法满足你的要求。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "So long as Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's decree remains in force, I am obliged to escort the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius and provide all possible assistance and support. I am afraid I cannot comply with your request."

languages.text: «Mientras el decreto del Lord Inquisidor Calcazar siga en efecto, estoy obligado a escoltar a{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de la casa von Valancius y proporcionarle toda la asistencia y apoyo posibles. Me temo que no puedo cumplir su solicitud».
languages.original_text: "So long as Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's decree remains in force, I am obliged to escort the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius and provide all possible assistance and support. I am afraid I cannot comply with your request."

traits.locale_text: «Mientras el decreto del Lord Inquisidor Calcazar siga en efecto, estoy obligado a escoltar a{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de la casa von Valancius y proporcionarle toda la asistencia y apoyo posibles. Me temo que no puedo cumplir su solicitud».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジター・カルカサルの命令が有効である限り、私はフォン・ヴァランシウス家の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}を護衛し、可能な限りの援助と支援を提供する義務がある。残念ながら、あなたの要請には応じられない」
languages.original_text: "So long as Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's decree remains in force, I am obliged to escort the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius and provide all possible assistance and support. I am afraid I cannot comply with your request."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジター・カルカサルの命令が有効である限り、私はフォン・ヴァランシウス家の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}を護衛し、可能な限りの援助と支援を提供する義務がある。残念ながら、あなたの要請には応じられない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "So lange Großinquisitor Calcazars Dekret Bestand hat, bin ich verpflichtet, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g} des Hauses Valancius zu eskortieren und mit allen Mitteln zu unterstützen. Ich fürchte, ich kann Eurer Bitte nicht nachkommen."
languages.original_text: "So long as Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's decree remains in force, I am obliged to escort the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius and provide all possible assistance and support. I am afraid I cannot comply with your request."

traits.locale_text: "So lange Großinquisitor Calcazars Dekret Bestand hat, bin ich verpflichtet, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g} des Hauses Valancius zu eskortieren und mit allen Mitteln zu unterstützen. Ich fürchte, ich kann Eurer Bitte nicht nachkommen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Tant que le décret du seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar est en vigueur, je suis obligé d'escorter {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}{/g} de la maison von Valancius et de l'aider dans toutes ses entreprises. Je crains donc de ne pas pouvoir répondre favorablement à votre requête. »
languages.original_text: "So long as Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's decree remains in force, I am obliged to escort the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius and provide all possible assistance and support. I am afraid I cannot comply with your request."

traits.locale_text: « Tant que le décret du seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar est en vigueur, je suis obligé d'escorter {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}{/g} de la maison von Valancius et de l'aider dans toutes ses entreprises. Je crains donc de ne pas pouvoir répondre favorablement à votre requête. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar'ın fermanı yürürlükte olduğu müddetçe von Valancius Hanesi'nin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Taciri'ne{/g} eşlik etmeye, mümkün olan her türlü yardım ve desteği sağlamaya mecburum. Korkarım bu isteğine tamam diyemeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "So long as Lord Inquisitor Calcazar's decree remains in force, I am obliged to escort the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius and provide all possible assistance and support. I am afraid I cannot comply with your request."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar'ın fermanı yürürlükte olduğu müddetçe von Valancius Hanesi'nin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Taciri{/g}'ne eşlik etmeye, mümkün olan her türlü yardım ve desteği sağlamaya mecburum. Korkarım bu isteğine tamam diyemeyeceğim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
